gprof.h

00001 #ifndef GPROF_HEADER
00002 #define GPROF_HEADER
00003 
00004 
00005 #ifndef STXXL_BOOST_THREADS
00006 
00007 /*
00008  * pthread_create wrapper for gprof compatibility
00009  * stolen from http://sam.zoy.org/doc/programming/gprof.html
00010  */
00011 
00012 #include <pthread.h>
00013 #include <sys/time.h>
00014 
00015 
00016 typedef struct wrapper_s
00017 {
00018     void * (*start_routine)(void *);
00019     void * arg;
00020 
00021     pthread_mutex_t lock;
00022     pthread_cond_t wait;
00023 
00024     struct itimerval itimer;
00025 } wrapper_t;
00026 
00027 static void * wrapper_routine(void *);
00028 
00029 /* Same prototype as pthread_create; use some #define magic to
00030  * transparently replace it in other files */
00031 int gprof_pthread_create(pthread_t * thread, pthread_attr_t * attr,
00032                          void * (* start_routine)(void *), void * arg)
00033 {
00034     wrapper_t wrapper_data;
00035     int i_return;
00036 
00037     /* Initialize the wrapper structure */
00038     wrapper_data.start_routine = start_routine;
00039     wrapper_data.arg = arg;
00040     getitimer(ITIMER_PROF, &wrapper_data.itimer);
00041     pthread_cond_init(&wrapper_data.wait, NULL);
00042     pthread_mutex_init(&wrapper_data.lock, NULL);
00043     pthread_mutex_lock(&wrapper_data.lock);
00044 
00045     /* The real pthread_create call */
00046     i_return = pthread_create(thread, attr, &wrapper_routine,
00047                               &wrapper_data);
00048 
00049     /* If the thread was successfully spawned, wait for the data
00050      * to be released */
00051     if (i_return == 0)
00052     {
00053         pthread_cond_wait(&wrapper_data.wait, &wrapper_data.lock);
00054     }
00055 
00056     pthread_mutex_unlock(&wrapper_data.lock);
00057     pthread_mutex_destroy(&wrapper_data.lock);
00058     pthread_cond_destroy(&wrapper_data.wait);
00059 
00060     return i_return;
00061 }
00062 
00063 /* The wrapper function in charge for setting the itimer value */
00064 static void * wrapper_routine(void * data)
00065 {
00066     /* Put user data in thread-local variables */
00067     void * (*start_routine)(void *) = ((wrapper_t *)data)->start_routine;
00068     void * arg = ((wrapper_t *)data)->arg;
00069 
00070     /* Set the profile timer value */
00071     setitimer(ITIMER_PROF, &((wrapper_t *)data)->itimer, NULL);
00072 
00073     /* Tell the calling thread that we don't need its data anymore */
00074     pthread_mutex_lock(&((wrapper_t *)data)->lock);
00075     pthread_cond_signal(&((wrapper_t *)data)->wait);
00076     pthread_mutex_unlock(&((wrapper_t *)data)->lock);
00077 
00078     /* Call the real function */
00079     return start_routine(arg);
00080 }
00081 
00082 #endif
00083 
00084 #endif
